Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Boards

Interface GameBoardHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameBoard
public interface GameBoardHandler
This interface provides all the methods useful to interact with the model

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void actionMarbles​(java.util.List<Marble> marblesPlayer, java.util.List<PlayerAction> actions, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> shelves)
    This method allows the current player to manage the marbles taken from the marketBoard.
    void activateCard​(int position)
    This method allows the current player to activate the leader card in position with number 'position'.
    void attachView​(Update virtualView)
    This method attaches the virtualView to the model
    void buyCard​(int slot, CardColor color, int level, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> shelves, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> quantity, java.util.ArrayList<ResQuantity> strongbox)
    This method allows to buy the development card with color 'color' and level 'level' on the top of the deck and it allows to add that card in the slot with number 'slot' of the current player.
    void disconnectPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
    This method manages the disconnection of a player
    void doProduction​(java.util.ArrayList<Production> productions, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> shelves, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> quantity, java.util.ArrayList<ResQuantity> strongbox)
    This method allows the current player to activate the production of all the productions passed as parameters.
    void exit()
    This method allows the current player to end his turn.
    Production getBoardProduction()  
    Production getDevProduction​(int slot)
    this method gets the production of the development card present in the indicated slot
    Production getLeaderProduction​(int position)
    this method gets the production of the development card present in the indicated position
    void initializeGame​(java.lang.String file)
    This method distributes the leader cards and updates the view
    void initializeLeaderCard​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Boolean> leaderStatus)
    this method discards the leader card in the indicated position without adding faith points to the player's faithTrack
    void insertResources​(java.util.List<Resource> resources, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> shelves)
    This method allows the current player to manage resources during the initialization.
    boolean isCurrentPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
    this method checks if the nickname belongs to the current player
    void reconnectPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
    This method manages the reconnection of a player
    void removeCard​(int position)
    This method allows the current player to remove the leader card in position with number 'position'.
    void swapWarehouse​(int source, int target)
    This method allows the current player two swap the content of two shelves of his warehouse.
    void takeMarketColumn​(int column)
    This method allows to take a specific column from the MarketBoard of the current player.
    void takeMarketRow​(int row)
    This method allows to take a specific row from the MarketBoard of the current player.

  • Method Details

    • initializeGame

      void initializeGame​(java.lang.String file)
      This method distributes the leader cards and updates the view
      Parameters:
      file - configuration file

    • exit

      void exit() throws InvalidActionException
      This method allows the current player to end his turn.
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the player can't do this action

    • isCurrentPlayer

      boolean isCurrentPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
      this method checks if the nickname belongs to the current player
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the palyer
      Returns:
      true if the nickname belongs to the current player, false otherwise

    • disconnectPlayer

      void disconnectPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
      This method manages the disconnection of a player
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player disconnected

    • reconnectPlayer

      void reconnectPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname) throws InvalidActionException
      This method manages the reconnection of a player
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player reconnected
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the player can't do this action

    • attachView

      void attachView​(Update virtualView)
      This method attaches the virtualView to the model
      Parameters:
      virtualView - the virtual view observer of the model

    • getDevProduction

      Production getDevProduction​(int slot) throws InvalidActionException
      this method gets the production of the development card present in the indicated slot
      Parameters:
      slot - the number of the slot
      Returns:
      the production of the card present in the slot
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the slot does not exist or if it is empty

    • getLeaderProduction

      Production getLeaderProduction​(int position) throws InvalidActionException
      this method gets the production of the development card present in the indicated position
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the leader card
      Returns:
      the production of the card present in the indicated position
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the position is not correct

    • initializeLeaderCard

      void initializeLeaderCard​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Boolean> leaderStatus) throws InvalidActionException
      this method discards the leader card in the indicated position without adding faith points to the player's faithTrack
      Parameters:
      leaderStatus - the position of the leader card
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the position is not correct

    • getBoardProduction

      Production getBoardProduction()
      Returns:
      the production associated with the personal board

    • takeMarketRow

      void takeMarketRow​(int row) throws InvalidActionException
      This method allows to take a specific row from the MarketBoard of the current player.
      Parameters:
      row - the row the player wants to take
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid

    • takeMarketColumn

      void takeMarketColumn​(int column) throws InvalidActionException
      This method allows to take a specific column from the MarketBoard of the current player.
      Parameters:
      column - the column the player wants to take
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid

    • actionMarbles

      void actionMarbles​(java.util.List<Marble> marblesPlayer, java.util.List<PlayerAction> actions, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> shelves) throws InvalidActionException
      This method allows the current player to manage the marbles taken from the marketBoard.
      Parameters:
      marblesPlayer - the marbles selected by the player
      actions - the actions to be performed on each marble
      shelves - the shelves where the resources associated to the marbles have to be inserted
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid

    • insertResources

      void insertResources​(java.util.List<Resource> resources, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> shelves) throws InvalidActionException
      This method allows the current player to manage resources during the initialization.
      Parameters:
      resources - the resources selected by the player
      shelves - the shelves where the resources have to be inserted
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid

    • swapWarehouse

      void swapWarehouse​(int source, int target) throws InvalidActionException
      This method allows the current player two swap the content of two shelves of his warehouse.
      Parameters:
      source - the number of the first shelf
      target - the number of the second shelf
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid

    • buyCard

      void buyCard​(int slot, CardColor color, int level, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> shelves, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> quantity, java.util.ArrayList<ResQuantity> strongbox) throws InvalidActionException
      This method allows to buy the development card with color 'color' and level 'level' on the top of the deck and it allows to add that card in the slot with number 'slot' of the current player.
      Parameters:
      slot - the number of the slot in which the player wants to add the card
      color - the color of the card the player wants to add
      level - the level of the card the player wants to add
      shelves - ArrayList of Integer which represents all the shelves selected
      quantity - ArrayList of Integer which represents the amount of resources selected for each shelf
      strongbox - ArrayList of ResQuantity which represents all the resources selected from the strongBox It is important that each resource is present at most once
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid

    • doProduction

      void doProduction​(java.util.ArrayList<Production> productions, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> shelves, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> quantity, java.util.ArrayList<ResQuantity> strongbox) throws InvalidActionException
      This method allows the current player to activate the production of all the productions passed as parameters.
      Parameters:
      productions - ArrayList of Production which represents all the productions the player wants to activate
      shelves - ArrayList of Integer which represents all the shelves selected
      quantity - ArrayList of Integer which represents the amount of resources selected for each shelf
      strongbox - ArrayList of ResQuantity which represents all the resources selected from the strongBox It is important that each resource is present at most once
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid

    • activateCard

      void activateCard​(int position) throws InvalidActionException
      This method allows the current player to activate the leader card in position with number 'position'.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the leader card
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid

    • removeCard

      void removeCard​(int position) throws InvalidActionException
      This method allows the current player to remove the leader card in position with number 'position'.
      Parameters:
      position - the position of the leader card
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if the action is invalid
